message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. This product is not just an item; it's a gateway to achieving your goals and enhancing your lifestyle. Given its significance to you, we believe it's worth more than its face value. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you for $950,000. This offer reflects my desire to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction. I trust this price aligns with your expectations and financial capabilities. Should you choose to accept this offer, please let me know, and we can proceed with the details of the sale.
